subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: For better or worse, watching the game was like gazing through a crystal ball for the Mets, who got a look at their future, with Alay Soler starting and 21-year-old Lastings Milledge starting in right field in place of Xavier Nady.
snippet: For better or worse, watching the game was like gazing through a crystal ball for the Mets, who got a look at their future, with Alay Soler starting and 21-year-old Lastings Milledge starting in right field in place of Xavier Nady.
